LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
• Only registered customers (see list below) with a public and a secret key for the API have access to it.
  • You can remove the access for a customer permanently by deleting the keys or temporary by disallowing them.
  • The rights of the respective customer group are valid for the API too.

LocaleResource.Name: ApiOdataUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: URL of the OData Web API.

LocaleResource.Name: ApiOdataMetadataUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: URL of the OData metadata. It describes the complete entity data model (EDM) the Web API is based on.

LocaleResource.Name: SwaggerUrl.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: URL of the Swagger documentation of the Web API.

LocaleResource.Name: IsActive.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the Web API is active and accepting requests.

LocaleResource.Name: MaxTop.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the maximum pagesize. Requests with a larger value for the pagesize ($top option) will be rejected.

LocaleResource.Name: MaxExpansionDepth.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the maximum expansion depth for the $expand option.

LocaleResource.Name: Activate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enables API access for this customer.

LocaleResource.Name: Deactivate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Disables API access for this customer.

LocaleResource.Name: RemoveKeys.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Deletes the API access keys of this client.

LocaleResource.Name: CreateKeys.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Creates API access keys for this customer.
